pageContext.claim: “I think we've done a great job. As you know, minimal numbers were -- minimal numbers were going to be 100,000 people. Minimal numbers were going to be 100,000 people.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump once suggested 15 cases would soon go away. Now he changes the goalposts and says 100,000 deaths was supposed to be the minimal number. The United States crossed that figure a month later.
